titleStmt.title: New experiments, and observations, made upon the icy noctiluca imparted in a letter to a friend living in the country : to which is annexed A chymical paradox / by Robert Boyle.
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.E. for B. Tooke,

notesStmt.note: "A chymical paradox" has special t.p. and is paged continuously.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
